attributes.action: Make it perfectly legal for a man or a women to go topless in public if 500 people should sign this petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why is it wrong for women but not for men to display there chest in public? I'm doing this because I think the current law is wrong, I'm doing it because doing it is right. If one person wants to walk around topless then why shouldn't they? It’s down to personal choice, they are not hurting anyone, they are not even harming themselves, at what age should a women cover herself up? Maybe we ought to to hand out jilbabs to every women over 14 we could have a trial week in school then ASK them if they would like to keep it, but at the end of the day it should be their choice, not yours.
